question.title: Java Selenium ClassNotFoundException
question.body:
I am trying to set up to use Selenium 4.18.1 using Java 11, but I am facing ClassNotFoundException.

I put all the jar files (including the lib folder) for the Java binding folder as a project build path on Selenium Download Page on that site.

List of jars

List of jars 2

import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver;

System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", D:\\googleDrive\\chromedriver.exe");
WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver();
driver.get("https://www.google.com/");
driver.quit();

Also, Google Chrome Drive also has files that fit the latest version.

ClassNotFoundException occurs when server boots after project clean. There is no error in that Java file, but I don't know why.

java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver
    at org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoaderBase.loadClass(WebappClassLoaderBase.java:1412)
    at org.apache.catalina.loader.WebappClassLoaderBase.loadClass(WebappClassLoaderBase.java:1220)
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredMethods0(Native Method)
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.privateGetDeclaredMethods(Class.java:3166)
    at java.base/java.lang.Class.getDeclaredMethods(Class.java:2309)
    at org.springframework.util.ReflectionUtils.getDeclaredMethods(ReflectionUtils.java:571)
    at org.springframework.util.ReflectionUtils.doWithMethods(ReflectionUtils.java:490)
    at org.springframework.util.ReflectionUtils.doWithMethods(ReflectionUtils.java:474)

If anyone knows anything about it, I'd appreciate it if you could let me know.
